summary: A widowed working-class father falls in love with a struggling, poor artist.
cast: Valerio Mastandrea|Alba Rohrwacher|Giuseppe Battiston|Claudia Gerini|Luca Zingaretti|Maria Paiato|Michele Maganza|Shi Yang Shi|Luca Dirodi|Serena Pintucci|Fausto Russo Alesi|Giuseppe Cederna|Giselda Volodi|Gigio Alberti|Pierfrancesco Favino|Neri Marcorè|Gianluca Guastella|Federico Sella
title: El comandante y la cigüeña
